contentrichtext.text: [[File:Xie Juezai.jpg|thumb]] {{Chinese name|[[Xie (surname)|Xie]]}} '''Xie Juezai''' ([[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 谢觉哉; [[Pinyin]]: ''Xiè Juézāi''; 1884 — 1971) was a Chinese politician and the President of the [[Supreme People's Court of China]]. ==Biography== Xie Juezai was born in [[Ningxiang]], [[Hunan]]. He was the [[Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China|Minister of Domestic Affairs]] (内务部长) from 1949 to 1959, and the President of the Supreme People's Court from 1959 to 1965 and Vice Chairman of the [[Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference]] from 1964 to 1971. ==External links== * [http://202.106.161.5:7777/was40/search?channelid=36976&searchword=%B1%EA%CC%E2=%25%D0%BB%BE%F5%D4%D5%25 Xie Juezai's profile] {{start box}} {{s-gov}} {{succession box | before = none | title = [[Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China|Minister of Domestic Affairs]] | years = 1949 – 1959 | after = [[Qian Ying]]}} {{s-legal}} {{succession box | before = [[Dong Biwu]] | title = President of the [[Supreme People's Court of China]] | years = 1959 – 1965 | after = [[Yang Xiufeng]]}} {{end box}} <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]] --> {{Persondata |NAME=Xie, Juezai |ALTERNATIVE NAMES= |SHORT DESCRIPTION=President of the [[Supreme People's Court of China]] |DATE OF BIRTH=1884 |PLACE OF BIRTH= |DATE OF DEATH=1971 |PLACE OF DEATH= }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xie, Juezai}} [[Category:1884 births]] [[Category:1971 deaths]] [[Category:Chinese judges]] [[Category:People from Changsha]] [[Category:Presidents of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China]]
